short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the visual appearance of GoGuardian block pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While GoGuardian helps students stay safe on the internet, it doesn't help students stay safe from its poorly-designed "website restricted" pages. It's time for a change, with the power of NoGuardian! 

NoGuardian replaces GoGuardian text and images on website-blocked pages with a photo of Vector, while still keeping students protected on the internet.
